fulltext:

 EDUCATION
FOREIGN TRADE UNIVERSITY HCMC
SEP 2015 - SEP 2019
Major: International Finance
GPA: 3.23/4 (GOOD DEGREE)

WORK EXPERIENCE
TIENDIENTU.ORG (BLOCKCHAIN MEDIA)
JUNE 2019 - PRESENT
Analyst and content creator
- Research and analyze Blockchain projects.
- Create content for many categories: PR, news, analysis.
Achievements and skills gained: 
-Increasing 50% reader interaction.
-Knowledge about Blockchain tech and Blockchain trend.
-Project analytical skills.
FREELANCE
APR 2019 - JULY 2019
Content marketing creator about Coaching, Personal Development and Fitness
- Brainstorming content for topics that customer offer. 
- Creating SEO content for website.
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Knowledge about content marketing and SEO.
- Ability to understand customer's insights.
- Working with self-discipline and self-motivations.
TRADERVIET (FINANCIAL INVESTING MEDIA)
APR 2018 - FEB 2019
Staff and forum's moderator
- Analyzing cryptocurrency market.
- Creating content related to cryptocurrency market for community.
- Supporting company in organizing events 
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Creating more than 500 topics in the forum with total +600.000 views.
- One article is retweeted by CEO of Binance - the biggest cryptocurrency exchange in the
world.
- Observing, learning about market and investor psychology.
- Improving writing skills, creativity and critical thinking.
HOCHIMINH STOCK COMPANY (HSC)
NOV 2017 - FEB 2018
Stock Broker Intern
- Researching about Vietnam stock market.
- Consulting and opening stock account for customers.
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Communication skill.
- Knowledge about stock company operations and Vietnam stock market.
NGUYỄN ÁNH DƯƠNG
April 17, 1997
 Male
 0775676122
 anhduongnguyen174@gmail.com
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
OBJECTIVES
Seeking a challenging marketing
position where I can learn more about
marketing and improve my
interpersonal skills to become a best
version of myself.
SKILLS
Communication
Writing
Logical and critical thinking
Creative and analytical thinking
English
Design (Photoshop)
INTERESTS
Reading
Music
Fitness
Cooking
 ACTIVITIES
MUA HE XANH
JULY 2018 - AUG 2018
Business development for local
- Organizing event for local.
- Supporting local development.
FTUCHARM 2018
APR 2018 - MAY 2018
Top 15 manhunt of FTUCharm 2018
-Supporting Top 15 FTUCharm Miss to perform well at this contest.
 REFERENCES
Mr. Dương Nguyễn Huy
CEO of TraderViet
Mobile: 0989617080
Ms. Vương Xuyên
CEO of Tiendientu.org
Mobile: 0963215047
